data.name: Send No Flowers
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Anthony Albano has been brutally gunned down, and now his daughter, Toni, is out to prove that she's just as ruthless as he was. The mafia heiress takes control of the family business, much to the chagrin of the men that worked for her father. Organized crime remains an all-boy's club, but Toni will stop at nothing to make sure that Albano remains the most feared name in New York City. To do this, Toni most reconnect with her estranged sister with a drug problem, dodge the feds, and show the men of the mafia what it really means to be a crime boss.
data.about_the_game: Anthony Albano has been brutally gunned down, and now his daughter, Toni, is out to prove that she's just as ruthless as he was. The mafia heiress takes control of the family business, much to the chagrin of the men that worked for her father. Organized crime remains an all-boy's club, but Toni will stop at nothing to make sure that Albano remains the most feared name in New York City. To do this, Toni most reconnect with her estranged sister with a drug problem, dodge the feds, and show the men of the mafia what it really means to be a crime boss.
data.short_description: Mafia princess, Toni Albano, discovers that her father has been gunned down by a rival crime family. Toni fights to take control of the family business and become the most powerful crime boss in New York, but the world of organized crime proves that it isn't ready to accept a broad in charge.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
